channel.title: [508] OffMyJock (under construction) [508]
channel.description:
[size=20pt][b]Currently Working On A Decent Magic Base. (70%) Completed.[/b][/size]
Full High Definition Full Clan Chat. All Emotes + Skillcape emotes working 100%! Basic Shops added. Added 1263 Mapdata files. Full banking! Full trading! Flood Protection from bots/syi nerds. Added most of the pots (Ex: Strength, SuperStrength, and a lot of others.) Fixed Ignore list and Friends list.
What skills have I Finished. green = finished... red = haven't touched yet. Attack Strength Defence Range Prayer [color=green]Magic[/color] ( almost completed ) [color=green]Runecrafting[/color] Construction ( I am using a new construction base, never before released to any skilling server) Hitpoints Agility [color=green]Herblore[/color] Thieving Crafting ( I am at this minute creating a new crafting base that will let players make snakeskin,pottery,string,glass, and leather items) [color=green]Fletching[/color] Slayer Hunter [color=green]Mining[/color] [color=green]Smithing[/color] Fishing Cooking [color=green]Firemaking[/color] [color=green]Woodcutting[/color] Farming Summoning
[IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/95pmv4.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/2vn03gh.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/312wnq0.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/okd3lf.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/2qdo95h.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/xmilbs.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/o8driu.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/2v0mo8x.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/znsas5.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/2v7w1hz.png[/img]
And to the people noticing the statius warhammer in smithing pic, THAT IS JUST MY CLIENT SHOWING, IF YOUR USING A DIFFERENT CLIENT IT WILL SHOW DIFFERENTLY.

item.title: [508] OffMyJock (under construction) [508]
item.dc:creator: @justinxg27 justinxg27
item.description:
@justinxg27 wrote:

[quote=“zack_flowers, post:41, topic:323685”]I’m taking a break with the project, me and a buddy are working on a full construction base never before released yet.

  1. All rooms have been fully added,
  2. Working on interfaces on “build” then the work bench, and adding combat to the house, like dungeon, etc.

At this moment, I am having difficulty with interfaces 394 and 396, Can’t fully get the items to “build” because of the arrays, etc. Oh well, I’ll get it eventually. Hopefully be done with construction by next month.[/quote]

To make combat in specific areas you should do this:
In Player.java add these boolean's

public boolean boxingRing(){
		return absX >= XXXX && absX <= XXXX && absY >= YYYY && absY <= YYYY;

public boolean dungeonArea(){
		return absX >= XXXX && absX <= XXXX && absY >= YYYY && absY <= YYYY;

Then search "Attack" in Player.java ~ Make it look something like this:

if(AtClanField() || AtDuel() || AtPits() || boxingRing() || dungeonArea())
{
frames.setPlayerOption(this, "Attack", 1);

That will make it attackable, I'm very sure.

Similar to my tutorial.

Don’t forget to add your own coords.

Read full topic

item.title: [508] OffMyJock (under construction) [508]
item.dc:creator: @zack_flowers zack_flowers
item.description:
@zack_flowers wrote:

I’m taking a break with the project, me and a buddy are working on a full construction base never before released yet.

  1. All rooms have been fully added,
  2. Working on interfaces on “build” then the work bench, and adding combat to the house, like dungeon, etc.

At this moment, I am having difficulty with interfaces 394 and 396, Can’t fully get the items to “build” because of the arrays, etc. Oh well, I’ll get it eventually. Hopefully be done with construction by next month.

Read full topic
